CmdLine: apt-get -y update && apt-get install -y jq wget unzip &&     wget https://releases.hashicorp.com/vault/$VAULT_VERSION/vault_${VAULT_VERSION}_linux_amd64.zip &&     unzip vault_${VAULT_VERSION}_linux_amd64.zip &&     mv vault /usr/bin &&     rm vault_${VAULT_VERSION}_linux_amd64.zip &&     wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/anduintransaction/Dockerfiles/master/vault-kube/vault-kube &&     mv vault-kube /usr/bin &&     chmod 755 /usr/bin/vault-kube &&     apt-get autoremove -y && apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
Commands.Name: run
